title: American Horror Story: Hotel - Sally Joins Twitter
author: Leather and Lace
comment: She definitely listens to Lana del Rey now.
What I thought was so cool about this scene was that i had never seen a movie or tv show embrace social media, only focus on its negatives. I was super happy for Sally!
Omg how many people have I talked to online that are ghosts???
Luckily for sally: she is aesthetic
A happy ending in American Horror Story I could not believe it
description: From 5x12. Love this scene. I DO NOT OWN THE RIGHTS. FOX/FX DO.
